gov.niarl.his.privacyca

Class TpmPubKey

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.niarl.his.privacyca.TpmPubKey

  • public class TpmPubKey
extends Object

    This class is for the TCG's TPM_PUBKEY structure.

    Author:
    schawki

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TpmPubKey() 
      TpmPubKey(byte[] newKey)
      Create a TPM_PUBKEY using the specified modulus.
      TpmPubKey(ByteArrayInputStream source)
      Create a new TPM_PUBKEY by extracting it from a byte stream.
      TpmPubKey(RSAPublicKey pubKey, int encScheme, int sigscheme)
      Create new TPM_PUBKEY by specifying the public key, encryption scheme and signature scheme.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TpmPubKey

        public TpmPubKey()

      • TpmPubKey

        public TpmPubKey(RSAPublicKey pubKey,
         int encScheme,
         int sigscheme)
        Create new TPM_PUBKEY by specifying the public key, encryption scheme and signature scheme.
        Parameters:
        pubKey - The RSA public key structure, containing the modulus and public exponent.
        encScheme - The defined encryption scheme value.
        sigscheme - The defined signature scheme value.

      • TpmPubKey

        public TpmPubKey(byte[] newKey)
        Create a TPM_PUBKEY using the specified modulus. An default encryption scheme of 1 (TPM_ES_NONE) and signature scheme of 2 (TPM_SS_RSASSAPKCS1v15_SHA1) will be used.
        Parameters:
        newKey - The new modulus in the form of a byte array.

      • TpmPubKey

        public TpmPubKey(ByteArrayInputStream source)
          throws TpmUtils.TpmUnsignedConversionException,
                 TpmUtils.TpmBytestreamResouceException
        Create a new TPM_PUBKEY by extracting it from a byte stream.
        Parameters:
        source - The ByteArrayInputStream from which to extract the TPM_PUBKEY.
        Throws:
        TpmUtils.TpmUnsignedConversionException
        TpmUtils.TpmBytestreamResouceException

    • Method Detail

      • getKeybytes

        public byte[] getKeybytes()
        Get the RSA key modulus.
        Returns:
        The modulus as a byte array.

        public RSAPublicKey getKey()
                    throws NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                           InvalidKeySpecException
        Return an RSAPublicKey structure representing the key stored in this TPM_PUBKEY.
        Returns:
        The RSAPublicKey.
        Throws:

                   throws TpmUtils.TpmUnsignedConversionException
